    Safe and Secured with Clerk Authentication

    Security is our top priority. With Clerk Authentication, your data remains protected with industry-leading security protocols, ensuring only authorized users can access sensitive information.

    Multiple User Option

    Our platform supports multiple users, allowing your team members to access, review, and manage invoices effortlessly.

    Connect everywhere

    Stay connected and manage invoices from anywhere, anytime! With seamless integrations across WhatsApp, Gmail, and your web portal, you can access, process, and track invoices on the go.

    How it work

    Seemless Onboarding with a simple Sign Up

    The moment you sign in using Email or Mobile number, our system automatically connects to the respective API, linking your account securely. Once connected, the application is ready to receive invoices instantly—no extra setup required.

    Try Free Now
    Effortless Invoice Collection

    Receive Invoices Instantly

    Stop worrying about gathering invoices manually! Simply receive your invoices via WhatsApp or Email, and our system will automatically fetch them using secure API integrations.

    Try Free Now
    Smart Automation at Its Best

    AI Powered Processing Accurate, Fast, and Efficient

    Harness the power of AI-driven OCR technology to extract, analyze, and structure invoice data with lightning speed. Our intelligent system automatically recognizes and processes invoices from WhatsApp, Email, and multiple file formats.

    Try Free Now
    Stay in Control of Your Invoices

    View Your Dashboard

    Get a clear and organized view of all your invoices in one centralized dashboard. Track incoming invoices, monitor processing status, and access structured data in real time.

    Try Free Now

    Get Started with Scan The Doc

    Experience Invoice Automation with AI

    Automates Invoice processing by fetching files from WhatsApp and Gmail,
    using OCR technology to extract data dynamically.
    Then stores and displays the structured data in the Dashboard,
    eliminating manual effort and streamlining workflows.
